originalText.text: Dr Carrasco is just the best ! He treats his patients with care and respect. He listens to all your concerns and reply to each of them. He is clear and direct and gives all your options. Every time him as doctor and his team are great, the ladies at front desk kind. Thank you for the warmth experience every time.

Every time him as doctor and his team are great, the ladies at front desk kind. Thank you for the warmth experience every time.

originalText.text: Do not go to this office. Although Dr Shay is very very nice and I wish I could write differently about him, this office is completely inept. Not only do they make you wait for an hour after your appointment time to be seen they do not take your phone calls and instead “leave messages with the front desk.” I have been trying to get an alternative medication from them for weeks now. However they keep sending the incorrect medication to my pharmacy and try to charge me $900. No matter how many times I explain it to whoever answers the phone, the office has proved they 1. don’t listen 2. don’t conform to customer needs and frankly and this point 3. stupid. Extremely frustrated and disappointed with their services.

originalText.text: This was the most outstanding experience I have had with a medical professional in decades!  Dr. Carasco was engaging, informative, thorough and so much more.  The attending nurse, Andre,  was everything you would wish a nurse to be, in an environment that is usually stressful.  The office space and the administrative staff are a delight.

text.text: This was the most outstanding experience I have had with a medical professional in decades!  Dr. Carasco was engaging, informative, thorough and so much more.  The attending nurse, Andre,  was everything you would wish a nurse to be, in an environment that is usually stressful.  The office space and the administrative staff are a delight.

originalText.text: This is the first review I’ve ever left for anyone or anything in my life, but I have to share. After countless negative experiences elsewhere, I couldn’t have been happier to have found Dr. Shay. I’ve been putting off an ovarian cystectomy for YEARS, but felt comfortable to schedule it with Dr. Shay after just my first visit. Everything went as smooth as possible without any complications, and Dr. Shay was careful to remove just what he needed and nothing else. He has incredible bedside manner, and I felt a sense of relief as soon as he walked into the room. I simply can’t say enough good things about Dr. Shay! Also, the office visits are as easy as can be, with very friendly and attentive front desk staff, and very short to no wait times. I’ve gone from having the absolute worst fear and crippling anxiety before every gyno visit elsewhere, to feeling super comfortable and confident that I am in good hands. Dr. Shay and his team have really made all the difference for me. If you’re looking for a gynecologist, you’ve found him. 10/10 would and will recommend!

originalText.text: Honestly Dr.Shay is incredible and Vcare has been a wonderful experience for both my early pregnancy confirmations. I’ve loved them and their staff, I  recommend them highly. Completely a bonus but they also had chocolate and that is incredible lol. I’ve never waited longer than 15mins for my scans and honestly I don’t think I even waited 15 mins. They work pretty quickly. They printed pictures for me with no trouble as well. Solid 10/10 in my opinion.
